fields_of_interest: Business and Industry, Taxation, Single market, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Directive 2014/55/EU on electronic invoicing in public procurement
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: deliverables that are described in the standardization request by the European Commission in support of Directive 2014/55/EU on electronic invoicing in public procurement
goals__remit: The CEN Technical Committee CEN/TC 434 on Electronic Invoicing develops standards on electronic invoicing and developed the deliverables described in the standardization request by the European Commission (in support of Directive 2014/55/EU on electronic invoicing in public procurement). These standard are needed to support the exchange of information by electronic means in support of business processes in the trade of goods and services.
